jobs.name: Wanderer
jobs.description: A traveler belonging to no place. Wanders endlessly, even through death.
jobs.description_ja: どこにも属さない旅人。何度死んでも彷徨い続ける。
jobs.description_en: A traveler belonging to no place. Wanders endlessly, even through death.

jobs.name: Scholar

special_ability.name: Deep Insight
special_ability.description_ja: 発見による魂価値ボーナス+50%

jobs.description: A seeker of truth. Frail body harbors a relentless mind.
jobs.description_ja: 真実を追い求める者。弱き身体に強き探究心を宿す。
jobs.description_en: A seeker of truth. Frail body harbors a relentless mind.

jobs.name: Knight

special_ability.name: Shield Wall
special_ability.description_ja: 防御時、ダメージを70%軽減

jobs.description: A sworn warrior who once protected the village. Honor persists beyond death.
jobs.description_ja: かつて村を守った誓いの戦士。その名誉は死んでも消えない。
jobs.description_en: A sworn warrior who once protected the village. Honor persists beyond death.

jobs.name: Cyborg

special_ability.name: Overclock
special_ability.description_ja: 攻撃力が一時的に2倍になる

jobs.description: A soldier fused with machine. Human memory is lost, but combat instinct remains.
jobs.description_ja: 機械に融合した兵士。人間の記憶は失われても、戦闘本能は残る。
jobs.description_en: A soldier fused with machine. Human memory is lost, but combat instinct remains.
